Help:Node.title: Command Usage: !badname
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: !badname "[name]"
EXAMPLE: !badname "courier"
Adds a name to the bad names list so that players may not use that name as a character name. Swear words and names of importance to a game (like courier in Marrach) can all be added to bad names list.
The bad names list is specific for each game.
SEE ALSO: !badnames, !goodname
